name: V.R. Date: May Club
overview: Hajime Kudo is a recent college graduate, a month and a half away from beginning his new job working for the CAT trading company. The time off is nice enough, but Hajime feels he won't be able to properly start his new life unless he finds a girlfriend. One lucky day, Hajime receives an invitation to try a new virtual reality dating simulator, called May Club. Maybe this will be just the ticket... May Club is a visual novel with a few distinguishing features. The game has an internal calendar, keeping track of days of the week and different times of the day. The player is given a limited amount of cards which are used to access May Club. He can choose to go to May Club at any time and visit a few different locations. Depending on the day of the week and the time of the day, different events will be triggered. The player is sometimes prompted to choose responses during conversations, which will also influence subsequent events. The game has several different endings based on the relationships the protagonist has had with the female characters. This title contains graphic depictions of sex, and is for adults only.
